title: [Large-Scale] Life Skills Development Through Physical Education: Administrator Leadership Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Physical Education Concepts and Organizational Management Experience
context.additional_context: Corporate manager/leader-targeted program to strengthen life skills (teamwork, communication, stress management) through physical education activities; collaborative projects using mobile devices in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Through physical education activities, over 80% of participants will effectively apply team collaboration and conflict management skills.
Learners will utilize emotional self-regulation strategies in learning contexts at least 70% of the time to verify reduced job-related stress.
Learners will practice problem-solving and decision-making processes at least three times through PBL-designed physical education projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
